hadiths.text: Yazid reported:Salama sought to say prayer near the pillar which was by that place where copies of the Qur'an were kept. I said to him: Abu Muslim. I see you striving to offer your prayer by this pillar. He said: I saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) seeking to pray by its side

chapter.eng-name: The Praying Person Standing Close To The Sutrah
